English Version

Raymond Deng

Exploring the intersection of technology and art

About Me

I’m Raymond Deng (RD), a technology enthusiast with a passion for both the logical world of programming and the creative aspects of life. I believe in continuous learning and exploring new frontiers in technology while maintaining a balanced lifestyle filled with diverse interests.

Technical Expertise

My journey in technology has equipped me with a versatile skill set:

  • Programming Languages

    • Python: My primary language for data analysis, automation, and backend development
    • C/C++: For system-level programming and performance-critical applications
    • Web Development: Currently expanding my knowledge in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

  • Areas of Interest

    • Artificial Intelligence: Exploring machine learning applications and neural networks
    • Web3 Technologies: Investigating blockchain applications beyond cryptocurrencies
    • Quantitative Trading: Applying algorithmic approaches to financial markets

Beyond Technology

Life is about balance. When I’m not coding or learning about new technologies, I enjoy:

  • Water Activities: An accomplished swimmer who finds joy in the water
  • Winter Sports: Passionate about skiing and exploring mountain landscapes
  • Underwater Exploration: Discovering the beauty beneath the surface through diving
  • Travel Adventures: Particularly drawn to the cultures and landscapes of Southeast Asia
  • Musical Expression: Finding creativity and emotion through piano playing
  • Literary Journeys: Expanding perspectives through reading (See my book recommendations)

Connect With Me

I’m always open to interesting conversations, collaborations, or just exchanging ideas!

Email: ramond.d@outlook.com

Telegram: @ramond_deng

关于我

探索技术与艺术的交汇处

关于我

我是Raymond Deng（RD），一位热衷于技术的爱好者，对编程的逻辑世界和生活的创造性方面都充满热情。我相信持续学习和探索技术新领域的重要性，同时保持充满多样兴趣的平衡生活方式。

技术专长

我的技术旅程赋予了我多样化的技能：

  • 编程语言

    • Python：我主要用于数据分析、自动化和后端开发的语言
    • C/C++：用于系统级编程和性能关键型应用
    • Web开发：目前正在扩展HTML、CSS和JavaScript的知识

  • 兴趣领域

    • 人工智能：探索机器学习应用和神经网络
    • Web3技术：研究区块链在加密货币之外的应用
    • 量化交易：将算法方法应用于金融市场

技术之外

生活需要平衡。当我不编程或学习新技术时，我喜欢：

  • 水上活动：一位在水中找到乐趣的优秀游泳者
  • 冬季运动：热衷于滑雪和探索山地景观
  • 水下探索：通过潜水发现水下世界的美丽
  • 旅行冒险：特别喜欢东南亚的文化和景观
  • 音乐表达：通过钢琴演奏寻找创造力和情感
  • 文学之旅：通过阅读拓展视野（查看我的图书推荐）

联系我

我始终对有趣的对话、合作或简单的想法交流持开放态度！

电子邮件：ramond.d@outlook.com

Telegram：@ramond_deng
